base_description: Rectangular cabinet, black and gray, modern style.
part_description: Two main doors with grid-like windows, three shelves on the right side, rectangular shape, vertically aligned.
internal_interaction_description: The two doors open to reveal internal storage space, while the grid-like windows provide visibility. The shelves on the right side offer additional storage, supporting items placed on them. The doors and shelves are aligned to maximize space efficiency and accessibility within the cabinet.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet interacts with the external environment by providing storage space for various items. It can be placed against a wall and accessed by opening the doors. The grid windows allow visibility of contents, and the modern design complements contemporary interiors.
